summary: Email from Cindy Hopkins transmitting text files and Eclipse files containing her original notes from the December 4, 2009 deposition related to the Epstein case. The email serves as a transmission of deposition documentation.

persons.name: Cindy Hopkins
persons.context: Email sender who is providing text files and Eclipse files of her original notes from a December 4, 2009 deposition.

events.title: Deposition
events.description: A deposition was conducted on December 4, 2009, referenced by the attached notes and files.

keyFacts: Cindy Hopkins transmitted documents related to a December 4, 2009 deposition.
The transmission included text files and Eclipse files containing her original notes.
The email date was September 27, 2021, indicating a later transmission of older deposition materials.
